name: Extratorrent Dark with no ads.
additional_info: V1.0 (Dec 12, 2012) The stylechange applies for the torrent site. The forum will/may be supported later. V2.0 (Dec 14, 2012) Added stylesheet for forum and fixed a few things in the site theme. V3.0 (Dec 23, 2012) Cleaned the code a bit and fixed some things for the phpbb forum on ET. V4.0 (Nov 11, 2013) Changed domain tdl from .com to .cc as ET changed their domain name. V5.0 (Apr 07, 2014) Blocked two other advertisments. [[--Say thanks by making a small donaton.--]]
